detailed_analysis.speaker: Speaker 1
detailed_analysis.text: I think climate change is real. I know it's real 'cause I've read it in a book.

grammar.corrected_text: I think climate change is real. I know it's real 'cause I've read it in a book.

detailed_analysis.judgment: Flawless grammar. Everything reads clean and natural. Laser-focused on the subject; that clarity really strengthens your argument. Positive tone all around — it draws the reader in naturally. Even-tempered expression — clear without being flat. Engaged, on-topic, and uplifting — a genuinely strong contribution.

detailed_analysis.speaker: Speaker 2
detailed_analysis.judgment: Your phrasing flows effortlessly — not a single grammatical hitch. Not entirely on theme — refocusing would make it more coherent. The tone leans critical — might sound defensive if not balanced. Emotion runs high here — pulling back slightly could make it more persuasive. You sound frustrated and a little off-track; reconnecting with the main idea would help.

speaker_summary.Speaker 2: Fluent and clean. It’s a pleasure to read your phrasing. Your ideas are interesting, but not always tied to the main discussion.
speaker_summary.Speaker 1: Not a single grammatical flaw; it’s all very natural. You consistently bring the conversation back to the main idea. Nicely done.
